post.author: Admin
post.title: Market Day Orders Due Saturday
post.description:
Hi Band Boosters,
Market Day orders are due by this Saturday, November 1, 2014 at 11:00 pm at www.
post.content:
Hi Band Boosters,

Market Day orders are due by this Saturday, November 1, 2014 at 11:00 pm at www.marketday.com. Pick up is Thursday, November 6, 2014 from 6:00 pm - 7:00 pm. This is the same date, time and place you will pick up any pies you ordered through your band student.

If you spend at least $90 this month and enter the promo code NOVBONUS during checkout you will receive a free Dessert Pedestal.

Also, if you have never ordered from Market Day before, and you place an on-line order of $50 or more, you can save $5 by entering the promo code FALLFIVE during check out.

FYI....You can enter multiply promo codes on the same order.

If you have any questions, please contact me at suegaluska@yahoo.com or 440-582-4120.

Thanks,
Sue Galuska
